page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN ILMINGTON
page.content: Only a few people work in the{village} .The{school}employs seven people who live in the village.Others who live and work in the village are the{ {postman}and his wife,the{shopkeeper} and his wife,the{hurdlemaker}and his wife (they are also the{newsagents} ),two{publicans}and their wives,and the{garage owner}and his wife.There are eleven{farmers}and they employ an average of three men on each farm.It is important to note that the sons usually work on the farms with their Fathers.Their are many people living in the village who are{retired}and this number is increasing.Most of the working people who live in the village must travel(or{commute}) to find work to Birmingham,Coventry,Warwick,Oxford, Leamington,Stratford,Evesham or Shipston.Young people often move away.
